pages.text: To get started on your journey, one must understand the importance of basics. You will notice on your first time arriving on these lands that you will have to maintain a lot of aspects of your life. $(br2)For now, we will focus on these four aspects: $(br)$(#AA0000)Health, $(#00AA00)Hunger, $(#0000AA)Thirst, $()and $(#FFAA00)Temperature.

It's imperative to know how to deal with your current situation. This is the unfortunate reality of necessity than a freedom of choice. $(br2)However, life or death is still up to you. This book will briefly explain each aspect to give you a stronger grasp on how to live a healthy and prosperous adventure!
